text:
OK two more and then I'm done for now.

@UtahDOT claims that air pollution will go DOWN with this project, which will add 10,000 to 12,000 cars to the road every day. (That's not how pollution works.)
author: TaylorWAnderson

text: Here you go: What UDOT said would happen back in the early 1990s they now say will happen by 2040 if US-89 isn't turned into a freeway. Just trust them this time.
author: TaylorWAnderson

text: those screenshots are hard to follow. the main point is that the traffic UDOT forecasted simply doesn't exist. but turning US-89 into a freeway will bring the traffic it wants.
author: TaylorWAnderson

text:
lol - the traffic projections that for decades have been driving the calls for widening US-89 in davis county have been comically inflated. 

translation: UDOT has said if it doesn't turn US-89 into a freeway, traffic will be crippling. it was way off.
author: TaylorWAnderson

text:
So it’s Saturday but this is important. 

South Salt Lake is trying to ruin its new downtown by connecting Main Street with I-80, and #utleg gave it money for the job. 

Why. Why would you ruin the only potential bright spot in your town by turning it into State Street lite?
author: TaylorWAnderson

Last session, the #utleg declined to pass @RepBriscoe's bill for $100 million bonding for affordable housing. 

To show where they stand, they also declined to spend even a quarter of that this time around. #utpol
